amendment.description: Amendment allows the Secretary to give priority to flood control projects where (1) such project is already authorized and an executed partnership agreement exists; and (2) the project is in an area where loss of life has occurred due to a flooding event.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A021) offered by Mr. Green, Al.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Green, Al amendment (A021) Agreed to by voice vote.
